    | text      = I went to go check out what Carrie Cassidy has for us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:31.879
    | text      = I'm not sure how crashing an airline closes a gate and I'm afraid I didn't actually
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:37.879
    | text      = ask him the logistics of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:39.560
    | text      = Although now I wish I had.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:41.800
    | text      = Should have asked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:42.759
    | text      = Should have asked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:43.800
    | text      = Well, wait, is this one of the old Mark Richards ones?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:46.120
    | text      = This is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:46.759
    | text      = This isn't a sequel to the...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:48.120
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:49.399
    | text      = We don't have any new Mark Richards, but it's all new to us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:52.920
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:53.560
    | text      = Because we haven't heard these.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:54.920
    | text      = And I went back and there were...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:58.279
    | text      = Let me be fucking totally clear with you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:00.600
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:00.920
    | text      = I wasted a lot of time watching bad episodes of Project Camelot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:04.040
    | text      = I imagine so.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:04.839
    | text      = There were a couple that I don't even like, I thought there was one where she was talking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:08.680
    | text      = about Bilderberg and I'm like, oh, great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:10.759
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:11.000
    | text      = Wouldn't this be great to draw the stark parallels between her and Alex Jones?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:14.920
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:15.480
    | text      = And it was too boring.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:16.439
    | text      = It's not worth going over an episode, but suffice to say, she's scared of Bilderberg too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:20.040
    | text      = Who isn't?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:20.600
    | text      = Yay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:21.160
    | text      = So there's that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:21.959
    | text      = And then there was one where she's interviewing Infowars guest Leo Zagami,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:28.040
    | text      = the guy who pretends that he's a big Vatican insider.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:29.879
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:30.839
    | text      = And that was too boring.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:32.040
    | text      = So I spent a lot of time trying to find something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:35.319
    | text      = He does have a great flamboyant accent, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:37.240
    | text      = He does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:37.720
    | text      = It's fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:38.519
    | text      = He's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:39.720
    | text      = But I spent too much wasted time on that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:42.279
    | text      = And I'm like, you know who never disappoints?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:44.360
    | text      = Mark fucking Richards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:45.800
    | text      = And I realized there's at least three of the episodes that we have not even touched.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:49.240
    | text      = Perfect.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:50.040
    | text      = So today I went back and this is the fourth trip that she went to go visit him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:53.959
    | text      = I believe this was two years ago, maybe or so, 2016, somewhere in there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:59.480
    | text      = But she's gone and spent some time with Mark Richards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:03.639
    | text      = For those of you who don't know, please go back and listen to the Mark Richards episodes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:07.000
    | text      = They're some of the finest episodes we'll ever make.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:09.560
    | text      = But the short version of it, he's a crazy dude who orchestrated a murder in California
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:16.680
    | text      = about 20-something years ago, give or take.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:19.399
    | text      = And planned on turning San Francisco into a city-state protected by lasers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:23.480
    | text      = He did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:23.879
    | text      = He was going to turn it into his own kingdom, where he was the king, over a bunch of young
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:32.360
    | text      = kids who would be lords or something along those lines.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:36.039
    | text      = It didn't work out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:37.559
    | text      = Great plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:38.120
    | text      = He orchestrated this murder.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:39.320
    | text      = He was found guilty of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.440
    | text      = But Carrie Cassidy does not believe that because he has told her that he was off-world at the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:44.919
    | text      = time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.399
    | text      = Off-world!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.960
    | text      = He is part of the secret space program.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:47.720
    | text      = And he was on a mission when the murder would have been committed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:50.919
    | text      = So he's got to be clean.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:52.039
    | text      = He is crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.240
    | text      = And he tells Carrie some of the stupidest shit I've ever heard in my life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:56.679
    | text      = She believes all of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:58.120
    | text      = And it's nuts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:59.720
    | text      = Although we have now, upon further review of Project Camelot episodes, she may not be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:08.759
    | text      = told as much as she says she's being told.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.279
    | text      = And she may be more orchestrating what she wants to get out of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:16.360
    | text      = The good news is, though, is we don't really need to worry about our
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:19.960
    | text      = really need to worry about our most recent Mark Richards episodes spoiling the story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:25.799
    | text      = Because it's bananas every time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.559
    | text      = It's all made up brand new.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:29.399
    | text      = There's plenty of pieces within this episode that are fresh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:33.159
    | text      = That might as well be current in the timeline.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.200
    | text      = They're reveals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:37.720
    | text      = But at the same time, too, I don't think we need to wrestle with the issue of scholarship
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.039
    | text      = or authorship on this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.440
    | text      = Who is it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.080
    | text      = Whose mind is bringing all this to the forefront?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.480
    | text      = It really doesn't matter that much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.759
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:49.080
    | text      = And also, if she's coming up with this stuff, then what she thinks she's studying is crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:54.360
    | text      = So it's even more interesting if she is fucking around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:57.879
    | text      = It's interesting if this accomplice to murder is manipulating her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:05.639
    | text      = But it's also interesting if she's like, oh, this is probably what real space people do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:10.600
    | text      = They hang out with raptors and they kill you for chocolate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.320
    | text      = More fascinating still further, I would say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.600
    | text      = Perhaps because we don't know this and because she's not allowed to record it, she has never
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:22.919
    | text      = actually spoken to Mark Richards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.440
    | text      = Maybe she talked to him one time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.120
    | text      = And then from here on out, it's just become sixth sense kind of stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:29.639
    | text      = She's talking into the mirror saying that it's Mark Richards and just making all this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.799
    | text      = bullshit up on her own.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.840
    | text      = I've seen her in a parking lot that was allegedly the prison.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.200
    | text      = But oh, well, that proves it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:39.320
    | text      = Never mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:39.720
    | text      = Who knows?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.240
    | text      = Joanne Richards might not even be married to this guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:43.320
    | text      = Oh, shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:44.120
    | text      = We got to find her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:45.000
    | text      = But you're right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:45.500
    | text      = They don't get to record things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.659
    | text      = And as always, when Caria goes to visit Mark Richards, she's got to tell you about how
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.659
    | text      = she had to write everything down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:55.980
    | text      = Hi, I'm Carrie Cassidy from Project Camelot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:59.659
    | text      = I'm here to talk about my recent interview with Captain Mark Richards of the secret space
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.019
    | text      = program.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.379
    | text      = And I interviewed him around a week and a half ago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:10.700
    | text      = And so at this time, I'm going to do sort of a recall of everything that we talked about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.419
    | text      = to the best of my ability.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:20.379
    | text      = I should note that we had only a small pencil.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.379
    | text      = It's quite a golf pencil and it runs out of ink.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.659
    | text      = Huh?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.220
    | text      = Wait, hold on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:29.259
    | text      = The pencil runs out of ink?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:31.419
    | text      = Weird pencil.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.539
    | text      = Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:33.100
    | text      = Weird pencil.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:33.659
    | text      = Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.379
    | text      = Is it a tiny mechanical pencil and she's calling the graphite ink?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.419
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.980
    | text      = No, but how do you make a tiny mechanical pencil?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:40.860
    | text      = I've never seen a tiny mechanical pencil.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:42.700
    | text      = It's always the same size as other pencils.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.860
    | text      = Like, is she talking about a golf pencil?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.779
    | text      = That's what my mind goes to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:48.700
    | text      = Or how big are her hands?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:50.620
    | text      = Have we ever seen her in physical relation to another human being?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.059
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.460
    | text      = Is she a giant?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.500
    | text      = She might be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:56.700
    | text      = But that would mean that like the books that she holds up are also giant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:59.740
    | text      = That's well, what else would giants read?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.899
    | text      = I don't know if those are commercially available.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.379
    | text      = Giant books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.100
    | text      = Yes, they might be, but to my knowledge, I haven't cruised all through Amazon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:09.659
    | text      = I don't know all that they offer, but that seems like it's a possibility.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:13.580
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.059
    | text      = But look, giant or not, she has a pencil with ink.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:17.899
    | text      = We'll leave that aside.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.100
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.740
    | text      = Probably just misspeaking and being a dick about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:23.340
    | text      = I don't know if we can trust that, Dan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:24.940
    | text      = Well, see, here's another thing you can't trust.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:28.059
    | text      = This is not the first time that Carrie tried to get over to the prison to interview Mark
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:32.620
    | text      = this time around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:33.500
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:34.000
    | text      = She meant to go previously to this, but something happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:39.200
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:39.600
    | text      = Something nefarious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.519
    | text      = First of all, I want to say that about six months ago, I was prevented from making this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:48.399
    | text      = trip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.200
    | text      = I was on the way there and I was hit by a scalar weapon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:52.799
    | text      = It froze part of my face or the half of the face and looked like Bill's palsy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:00.320
    | text      = But it did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.279
    | text      = But I was...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:02.080
    | text      = Did you have a stroke?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.440
    | text      = Just woken up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.399
    | text      = I just woke up in the morning with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:06.080
    | text      = I had nothing traumatic happen, so it was extremely strange and we don't exactly know
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.120
    | text      = what went on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:14.720
    | text      = You certainly don't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:15.600
    | text      = I think you just got Bell's palsy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:17.279
    | text      = Is she okay?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.720
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.960
    | text      = I mean, that happens to people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.320
    | text      = Like Jimmy Pardo has a story about how he got Bell's palsy and then it sort of went
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.240
    | text      = away.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:25.039
    | text      = Is that a thing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
